definition: to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: All of them have their uses when tunning a memory-hungry program.
sentences.chinese: 當調整渴求內存的程序時它們各有用處。

sentences.english: The human desire for recognition starts early .
sentences.chinese: 人類對讚賞的渴求早已有之。

sentences.english: Knowledge is like money: the more he gets, the more he craves .
sentences.chinese: 知識就像金錢，得到越多，渴求越多。

sentences.english: City’s recent purchase of Nasri really bumps them up here.
sentences.chinese: 曼城隊最近購入的納斯里凸顯了他們在這方面的渴求。

sentences.english: The thirst after happiness is never extinguished in the heart of man. --------------J. J. Rousseau.
sentences.chinese: 人類對幸福的渴求永遠不會從心中消失。

sentences.english: Recently, I met those guys I hoped for being my couple in my life again.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我重遇那些我曾渴求與他們一生一世的人。

sentences.english: Help satisfy your thirst for season 4 by putting True Blood on your home screen.
sentences.chinese: 幫助滿足您的主屏幕上把真愛如血第4季的渴求。

sentences.english: Purpose:To identify the"specific"neuro-anatomy structure in cue-elicited heroin craving.
sentences.chinese: 目的識別線索誘發海洛因渴求參與的特異腦功能區。

sentences.english: Is there something in the culture today that craves this direct emotion?
sentences.chinese: 是我們的當代文化在渴求這種直接的感情表達嗎？

sentences.english: It is the peculiarity of knowledge that those who really thirst for it always get it.
sentences.chinese: 凡真正渴求知識者，每能得之，這是知識的特性。

sentences.english: No wonder why it now fiercely defends its autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 不要去問它現在爲什麼如此渴求自主經營。

sentences.english: He had a deep spiritual hunger.
sentences.chinese: 可是，在他心中卻有極深的屬靈渴求。

sentences.english: Measures are being rolled out to support smaller companies, which have been starved of access to credit.
sentences.chinese: 政府已經推出相關舉措支持渴求信貸的小微企業。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who hunger and athirst for righteousness, for they shall be satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 賜福於飢餓和渴求正義的人們，因爲他們應得到滿足。

sentences.english: The dressing is a peanut-based sweet sauce that will leave you hungering for more.
sentences.chinese: 該花生醬是基於甜麪醬，將讓你更多的渴求。

sentences.english: Creativeness with its ecstasy comes with the freedom from craving, which is virtue.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着狂喜的創造力來自擺脫了渴求，這就是美德。

definition: hungry and thirsty/(fig.) to crave (knowledge, love etc)
to yearn for/to look forward to
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
